Title: Hard as a Rock
Description:
Hey! You know what awesome thing happened to me this morning?

I was strolling through the ruins with Anji, eyes on the ground so I wouldn't step on anymore of those creepy spider pods, when one of the statues came to life and tried to smash me!

Anji ended up doing the smashing. But I'm not satisfied. I think that you should go out there and smash all the statues, whether they're moving or not. It's the only way to be sure.
